Paragraph: 12 DTG shows lower intermolecular steric hindrance than DTS because of the longer C-Ge bond compared to the C-Si , resulting in the corresponding DTG - containing solar cells exhibiting higher short - current and fill factor.

| --- |

| C-Ge bond length | longer |
| C-Si bond length | shorter |
| Short-circuit current | higher |
| Fill factor | higher |
